front.title: Call on hold for telephony applications of SIP protocol

abstract.t: Many RFCs and Internet Drafts describe call on hold methods adoptedin SIP signaling protocol. The actual implementation may not alwaysbe ideal for telephony applications (reasons are explained below).This draft proposes a revision of call on hold method for SIPprotocol.Giordano [page 1]Internet-Draft Call on hold for telephony applications of SIP protocol
